artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Claude-Louis Desrais; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: From fashion periodical (P.15,180.1); woman holding a walking stick in a dark green gown with a blue hat with gray stripes and white trim on the brim with pink, black, and white plumes
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Plate I from Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Seconde Année, Douzième Cahier, 10 Mars 1787
